title: Hire additional workers, MP of labor falls

content.question: Suppose that a firm begins to hire workers for a newly completed plant with a fixed amount of machinery. As the firm hires additional workers, one would expect the marginal product to

choices.label: rise consistently due to diminishing return
rise consistently due to the advantages of specialization
rise consistently due to economies of scale

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
